about_the_game:
Florist Business Simulator combines imagination, strategy, and collaboration. You can create beautiful flower arrangements and decorate venues for grand events, always finding something exciting to do. Satisfy your customers by bringing the best designs with your flowers and becoming the top florist in town!



Turn ordinary spaces into spectacular event venues. Each venue type presents unique features and challenges, allowing you to showcase your floral design expertise and imagination. Whether it’s a romantic wedding, a grand corporate event, or a cozy private celebration, your task is to elevate the ambiance with beautiful flower arrangements. Let your talent and resources shine as you create unforgettable decorations that leave a lasting impression.



Explore your imagination through the creation of beautiful flower arrangements. Select from ten pot and vase templates to highlight your artistic talents. Experiment with different combinations of flowers, colors, and styles to produce one-of-a-kind designs. Enjoy a solo experience with this feature, immersing yourself completely in floral artistry.



Embark on an adventure through diverse environments to uncover and gather 20 unique types of flowers. Each flower boasts distinct attributes and beauty, eagerly awaiting admiration and inclusion in your collection. As you collect each flower, you'll have the opportunity to craft charming arrangements, showcasing the natural beauty of your floral finds.



The game takes players on a peaceful exploration through beautiful landscapes, where they search for unique flowers in stunning settings. This exploration allows players to enjoy nature and appreciate the beauty of flowers.

You have the opportunity to enhance the quality of your equipment and gradually expand your flower business. You start with simple tasks such as gathering in the wild and making beautiful flower arrangements, evolving to build your cultivation systems, and growing a variety of flowers to meet your customers' demands. Your hard work will help you shine in the floral market, leaving a memorable impact on the customers.

name: Florist Business Simulator

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64bit
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen 5 1600 / Intel Core i5-8400
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 970
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64bit
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen 5 3600 / Intel Core i7 7700K
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 1060 6GB
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible

short_description: Bring flowers from nature to venues in Florist Business Simulator. Develop your business by gathering flowers, making stunning arrangements, and decorating venues to delight your customers with beautiful spaces.
supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Dutch, Indonesian, Japanese, Korean, Portuguese - Brazil, Portuguese - Portugal, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese
